game.name: Electrician Simulator
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Take on the electrician role and learn the profession's basics! Install sockets, repair worn-out equipment, assemble broken appliances, replace light bulbs, and lay wires at your customers' homes. Be sure to check everything twice, with electricity there are no jokes!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Take on the electrician role and learn the profession's basics! Install sockets, repair worn-out equipment, assemble broken appliances, replace light bulbs, and lay wires at your customers' homes. Be sure to check everything twice, with electricity there are no jokes!

reviewHighlights.text: ---{ Graphics }--- ☐ You forget what reality is ☐ Perfect ☐ Beautiful ☐ Good ☐ Decent ☐ Okay ☐ Bad ☐ Very stylized ☐ They're what they should be for w...
Played for 2 hours and already learned more about electrician stuff that my dad tried to teach me lmao. Good game! we need more games like this
